properties.areaDesc: Straits of Florida from west end of Seven Mile Bridge to south of Halfmoon Shoal 20 to 60 NM out; Straits of Florida from Halfmoon Shoal to 20 NM west of Dry Tortugas 20 to 60 NM out
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued January 30 at 12:47AM EST by NWS Key West FL
properties.description:
The areas affected include...
Straits of Florida from west end of Seven Mile Bridge to 20 nm west
of Dry Tortugas 20 to 60 nm out...

At 1245 AM EST, National Weather Service meteorologists detected a
narrow 10 nm wide band of showers with a few embedded thunderstorms,
capable of producing wind gusts near 30 knots. This area of showers
and a few thunderstorms was located 36 nm south of Tortugas
Ecological Reserve South, moving east at 30 knots.

The thunderstorm will remain over mainly open waters.

In this marine area, prepare for showers and thunderstorms with wind
gusts near 30 knots...locally rough and confused seas...occasional
lightning strikes...and potentially blinding downpours.
